meanings.definition: The study of the nature of God and religious beliefs.

meanings.sent5: Theologs can be as complex as a maze, but with patience, it can be navigated.

meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable in theology.
meanings.sent1: Theologs often provide valuable insights into religious texts and beliefs.
meanings.sent2: As a theologs, she was sought after for her deep understanding of spiritual matters.
